# VirtualScroller.attachItem() method

Start observing size of `element` at `index`

**Signature:**

```typescript
attachItem(element: HTMLElement, index: number): void;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns**

void

## Remarks

Should be called when element gets mounted. Works in pair with [VirtualScroller.detachItem()](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.detachitem)<!-- -->.
